title: The Boy
description: I saw him and I froze.Why after all these years was he here?How did he find me?What to do?What to say?All I could do was stand there frozen just like the first time. It seems I have always been like this frozen in time.Time stood still.My soul froze.So many questions. How could it be?How did the world return him to me?Is this a dream?Is it real?Am I?
author: Lindsay Melissa
